#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

string result( string& );

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;

    while ( t -- )
    {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        cout << result( s ) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

string result( string &s )
{
    string left, right;

    const int n = s.length();
    const int l_s = ( n >> 1 )  - 1, r_s = n - 1;
    for ( int li = l_s, ri = r_s ; li >= 0 ; -- li, -- ri )
    {
        left += s[li];
        right += s[ri];
    }
    if ( n & 1 ) right += s[ l_s + 1 ];
    return left + right;
}
